title: Am I wrong for getting incredibly disappointed when I see someone lock in Corki?
body:
It's just like....yeah. I'm totally up for a game where we don't have an ADC at all. Unless Corki gets obscenely fed during the laning phase, he is basically a non-issue and enemies will just straight up ignore him and walk by him because he is basically tickle-poke-fun-time to most champions.

People love to go on about his early lane damage...but then if you wanted early dominance {{champion:119}} {{champion:51}}  or hell even {{champion:21}} {{champion:236}} . And those champions become nightmares when fed, while Corki just becomes merely "a threat". And they stay relevant throughout almost the entire game, whereas even full build Corki at the end of the game tends to just be "Could you just stop poking me? It's not doing anything and its just annoying".
